name: Bone'z and Towers
description:
Bonez' and Towers is a Reverse Tower Defense Game that pits the player against a village's defenses.

By using your selection of units, you must strategically destroy your way to the enemy base and overtake them before the sun destroys your forces!

This game was made as a Project for the Open Windows University. (https://www.openwindow.co.za/)

Lead Game Designer & UI Artist - Andrew Nel (https://andrewnella.itch.io/)
Lead Programmer & VFX Artist - John Owhin (https://johnowhin.itch.io/)
Lead Animation & Model Designer - Michael Todd
Lead Map & Sound Designer - Quinten Borcherds

Special Thanks goes to our Professors,  Paulo Vilela, Christiaan De Jager and Jared Brandjes, as well as our student peers for helping us on this project.
